Articles.Content:
Title almost says it all.  While in a vehicle, I don't have the Kerbal portraits on the bottom right.  I also can't switch to IVA view.  I assume these two are related.
It looks as if the vehicle was a drone...

As soon as I go to EVA (by manually clicking a hatch) the portraits appear, then disappear again when the Kerbal re-boards the vehicle.

Tried in career and sandbox mode, issue is persistent, 100% of pods tested, though I did not test ALL manned parts for this.
